author: Alex Evans
description:
The DnD Bard 5e class uses the power of pure charisma to cast spells, charm others, and inspire their party. A Dungeons and Dragons Bard often plays support to the group's strikers and defenders, but their power and versatility means that they never play second fiddle. This guide explains the complete class' rules and offers the expertise you need to craft a finely-tuned Bard build.

If you're still shopping around, we can explain the other DnD classes you can choose from. Or, if you need extra help building a Bard, here's all you'll need to know about DnD races and DnD 2024 backgrounds.

author: Timothy Linward
description:
The Grim ISU-152 Heavy Tank is a new gothic sci-fi tank kit from 3D sculptor Grim Prints, based on the colossally oversized Soviet ISU-152 self propelled gun that entered service during WW2. This kit comes with a variety of sci-fi weapon upgrades, but we think it’s the ‘Crusader’ variant that’s going to catch the most people’s attention - it’s a love letter to Mike Franchina’s incredible painting ‘Hammer of Witches’ from Trench Crusade.

author: Matt Bassil
description:
The nine Dungeons and Dragons alignments are broad categories used to measure a creature’s morality and lawfulness. The DnD alignments chart as we know it has been part of the game since 1977, but interpretations of it have evolved over time. This guide offers a detailed explanation of 5e alignments, with handy examples and a personality test to flesh out your D&D characters.
